message: I want to order 2 pepperoni pizzas and 3 chicken alfredo pizzas

Great! I found Pepperoni on our menu for AED 43.0 each, and Chicken Alfredo for AED 35.0 each. The total for your order would be AED 191.00.

Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

To proceed, I will need the following information:

- Your RFID Number (6 digits - located at back bottom right of your NYU card after the + sign)
- Building Number (from the options: "A1A", "A1B", "A1C", "A2A", "A2B", "A2C", "A3", "A4", "A5A", "A5B", "A5C", "A6A", "A6B", "A6C", "A1", "A2", "A3", "A4", "A5", "A6", "F1", "F2", "C1", "C2", "C3")
- Phone Number (UAE format)
- Special Requests - Do you have any special requests for your order? (like extra toppings, dietary restrictions, etc.) Store as "None" if no/none/etc.
yes, I'd like to confirm the order. I don't have any special requests. My RFID is 484202, my building number is A3, and my phone number is 538093224

Great! Here are your order details:

- 2 Pepperoni Pizzas (AED 43.0 each)
- 3 Chicken Alfredo Pizzas (AED 35.0 each)

Total: AED 191.00

Thank you for your order, [User's Name]! Your RFID Number is 484202, Building Number is A3, and Phone Number is 538093224.

Your order will be processed shortly. Enjoy your meal!

Thank you for ordering with us at New York University Abu Dhabi Dining Hall.
